definitions.definition: To treat unjustly ; to injure or harm ; to do wrong by.
examples: The dealer wronged us by selling us this lemon of a car .

definitions.definition: To deprive of some right , or to withhold some act of justice .
To slander ; to impute evil to unjustly .

main_definition: To treat unjustly ; to injure or harm ; to do wrong by.
secondary_definitions: To deprive of some right , or to withhold some act of justice .
To slander ; to impute evil to unjustly .
